PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We may collect the following categories of data:
dataCollection.cookies: Cookies to store language and theme preferences.
dataCollection.usageData: Anonymous usage data (e.g., pages you visit).
dataCollection.contactData: Data you voluntarily provide when contacting us (name, email).

dataUsage.title: Use of Data
dataUsage.description: Data is used to operate the site, personalize your experience, and improve services.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not share your data with third parties, except as required by law.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: Cookies are stored from 1 day to 12 months. Contact data is kept only as long as needed to respond to your request.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: You have the right to request a copy of your data, demand correction or deletion, and opt out of cookies.

changes.title: Changes
changes.description: We may update this policy. All changes will be published here.

PrivacyPolicy.contact: For any questions, please contact: stamat2000@gmail.com

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.introduction: By using this site, you agree to the terms below.

useOfSite.title: Use of the Site
useOfSite.description: The site is provided 'as is'. Use it only for lawful purposes.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All materials (logos, design, texts, images, 3D models) belong to Starion Digital and are protected by copyright.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Actions
prohibited.illegal: using the site for illegal activities;
prohibited.spam: sending spam or attempting to hack;
prohibited.copy: copying or modifying site content without permission.

limitations.title: Limitations of Liability
limitations.description: We are not liable for damages caused by the use of the site and do not guarantee uninterrupted operation.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Moldova / EU.

changes.title: Changes
changes.description: The terms may be updated. The new version will be published on this page.

CookieBanner.message: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing, you agree to our policy.
